Text: Thanks again and hope u have avery happy new year

My 87 yr old father-in-law loves Gunsmoke.  Thanks so much. I figure I can copy these avi files to his computer and let him watch them that way if nothing else.  Is there a way to convert/burn to a DVD so he can watch on TV?
Please post season 3 if you can. I love watching Gunsmoke and seeing how the characters and cast come together from the beginning to what TV land is showing now.
